professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in database management, performance tuning, backups, security patches, and troubleshooting. Proficient in managing production, development, and test databases, leveraging tools like Toad and Data Pump for efficient operations.

work_experience.job_title: Oracle Database Administrator, Operations - Data Management
key_responsibilities: Monitoring database performance and optimizing databases to improve efficiency.
Applying database security patches and upgrades as needed.
Handling daily backups and disaster recovery processes.
Maintaining partitioned tables and cloning databases for testing purposes.
Responding to application requests and resolving ORA errors.
Generating performance reports and collaborating with DevOps teams on database deployments.
Replicating data using Oracle GoldenGate for high availability.

work_experience.job_title: Oracle Database Administrator, Operations - Data Management
key_responsibilities: Continuing responsibilities from previous role with expanded focus on database replication and scalability.
Implementing advanced database tuning techniques to improve query performance.
Overseeing database migrations and ensuring smooth transitions during system upgrades.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to resolve complex database issues.
